name: grass-audio
description: audio player class, using the bass library as engine

scripts.build:dev: node-gyp rebuild --debug && cp cpp_src/lib/bass/x64/bass.dll cpp_src/lib/bass/x64/bassmix.dll build/Debug/
scripts.build:prod: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build --release

author: lpradopostigo@gmail.com
